Website Prices

What are our website prices?

Option 1

€95 *Special Offer

A single page website

Basic Static One Page

This option may be the most cost effective for startups. It can contain all the important information for you to attract customers to your business (see Demo Page for example). This wouldn’t be able to be updated by you. Currently, the only extra cost is the Domain Name, as hosting is free.

Option 2

€150-€250

All your information on multiple pages

Multi Page Website

A website built over several pages that showcase your business and allow customers to contact you from the site. For example...Services, About Us, Contact, etc. (See Demo Page for example). This site wouldn’t be updateable by you. It would need some technical knowledge but it’s ideal for a business where constant updates are not required. The only extra cost is the Domain Name as hosting is free.

Option 3

Starts at €250

A website you can maintain

A Full Website

For those who need a website they can update and manage themselves. I can, of course, manage the updates for you If required. I will give two hours training to show you how to create and manage content for your website. I can also produce a video that you can refer to for those times when “you just can’t quite remember how to do it”. We’ve all been there! The extra costs would be a Domain Name and cheap, reliable hosting.
